articles.author: Ciara O'Loughlin
articles.title: Paul Mescal and Phoebe Bridgers appear to confirm relationship as they cosy together on red carpet - Independent.ie
articles.description: Irish heartthrob Paul Mescal and American singer Phoebe Bridgers appear to have confirmed their relationship as they were snapped cosying up to one another on a red carpet.
articles.content:
Irish heartthrob Paul Mescal and American singer Phoebe Bridgers appear to have confirmed their relationship as they were snapped cosying up to one another on a red carpet.
